posted: may 4, 2015
this is a review seeing just how terrible minecraft is in terms of content in comparison to _________.

it's bad.
special note: this was made as of _________ 1.2 and i'm way too lazy to update it


items
mc items: 350
_________ items: 3646


enemies
mc enemies: 21
_________ enemies: 401


bosses
mc bosses: 2
_________ bosses: 29


potions
mc potions: 13
_________ potions: 76


weapons
mc weapons (varieties): 6
_________ weapons (varieties): 360
(5 swords, 1 bow, vs. 77 swords, 38 bows, 20 yoyos, 17 spears, 11 boomerangs, 13, flails, 5 "other melee", 60 guns, 28 staffs, 9 tomes of magic, 14 "other magic", 17 summon weapons, 31 thrown weapons, 4 turrets, 16 waraxes)


pets
mc pets*: 2
_________ pets: 44


mounts
mc mounts*: 3
_________ mounts: 11
(*including tameable mobs and rideable mobs)

on to my personal opinion (if you really do care): mixed opinions. i prefer minecraft for the building and the survival. _________ has a good array of things you can use to build but i like to use minecraft because of the complexity of machinery you can make using all the complicated gizmos and gadgets in it. as for survival, it's exceptionally fun in _________ but i like it in minecraft as well due to the sheer size and randomness of a world. in _________ everything is more or less always the same; corruption/crimson, hell, space, etc. but in minecraft there are so many more places to choose from! but all the same, _________ can be fun too.

so, opinions aside, due to our comparisons...
_________ wins!...
...right?

you see, it isn't about who has more of what. it's about the way to play. the way to enjoy it. you enjoy building, being creative, making pixel art? play minecraft, it's the perfect game for you. don't have much taste for being a super builder, but like adventuring, fighting, bosses, etcetera? play _________.


...or uninstall both and get a job, loser
